subject: Re: Reporting,trace messages, etc
msgSnippet: Steve, What are building component test using JUnit. Our tests are going to do a lot more than just testing individual methods. That is the setup takes a while
messageBody:
Steve,

What are building component test using JUnit. Our tests are going
to do a lot more than just testing individual methods. That is the
setup takes a while

Vern


--- In junit@y..., "Steve Freeman" <yahoo01@m...> wrote:
> From: "vrntech" <vrntech@y...>
> > 1. We have a need to put some trace messages in the tests so
as
> > to know the progress of the test itself because each test can be
> > fairly timeconsuming. Is there a way to have these capture this
> > output for an individual test in the GUI-based TestRunner? I see
only
> > thing that is captured for each test on the UI are the assertion
> > failures.
>
>
> It sounds like your tests are too large or too slow. What's taking
the time?
>
> Steve
>
> - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
> Steve Freeman steve@m...
> Programme chair OT2003. http://www.ot2003.org
>
> "Nonsense is just nonsense, but the study of nonsense is science."
